Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Teeny \Tee"ny\, a. Very small; tiny. [Colloq.] [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Teeny \Teen"y\, a. [See {Teen} grief.] Fretful; peevish; pettish; cross. [Prov. Eng.] [1913 Webster]

teeny adj : (used informally) very small; "a wee tot" [syn: {bitty}, {bittie}, {teensy}, {teentsy}, {wee}, {weeny}, {weensy}, {teensy-weensy}, {teeny-weeny}, {itty-bitty}, {itsy-bitsy}] [also: {teeniest}, {teenier}]
